name: The Chase
description:
The Chase is best known for its understanding of brands, for its creativity and for its strategic thinking. We firmly believe in the strategic importance of good design and are privileged to have been entrusted with brand design and guardianship for some very substantial organisations, with many of whom we enjoy relationships of longstanding.
Over the years The Chase has earned an outstanding and sustained reputation for creative excellence and in 2010, for the 6th consecutive year, was ranked among the top five most creative agencies in the UK and 2nd in the specific disciplines of both ‘Corporate Identity’ and ‘Branding’.
